name.en: Central Commercial Register of the Kingdom of Spain

description.en:
The Central Mercantile Register (1) provides the access to the companies information supplied by the Regional Mercantile Registers after the 1 January 1990, once the data has been organized and processed in accordance with Section 379 of the Mercantile Register Regulations currently in effect.

(1) Central Commercial Register - Central Corporate Register - Central Business Register

access.onlineAccessDetails:
The Central Mercantile Register offers two methods of obtaining information about registered companies and/or company names: 

1) USERS WITHOUT AGREEMENT - They should pay the corresponding legal tax by credit card. 
2) USERS WITH AGREEMENT - They must use the password assigned by the Central Mercantile Register after the Agreement has been signed.
